item.name: Upload files and folders in chunk

formdata.description:
Optional.
Pass a valid parent folder id

Required.
Pattern: /<folder_name>/<file_name>
Pass file path from current path

Example 1: For initial folder don't pass parent_folder_id, path = /<main_folder_name>/<file_name>

Example 2: For creating sub folder inside main folder pass parent_folder_id of main folder, path = /<sub_folder_name>/<file_name>

query.description:
Required.
Pass value in this pattern: 97eeb232-9f2f-4038-a663-a88437e63e44|file - 
That is uuid |Type.
Type can be: file, folder.
Comma seperated values for multiple files

Required.
Pass value in this pattern: 97eeb232-9f2f-4038-a663-a88437e63e44|file - 
That is uuid |Type.
Type can be: file, folder.
Comma seperated values for multiple files

formdata.description:
Required.
Pass a valid file/folder id

Required.
Pass only file/folder as value

Optional.
Pass email ids as array

Required for type Folder, optional for type file.
Value must be: visitor, editor.

Required if is_protected is true.
Pass a password

Optional.
Pass hours value as integer
